alert.note: Alert for Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 16 at 6:05PM MDT until September 16 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR EASTERN TODD COUNTY... At 702 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Littleburg, or 13 miles southeast of Mission, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 530 CDT a trained spotter reported gusts of 60 mph and a weather station recorded gusts of 75 mph. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Mission, Okreek, Antelope, Sicangu Village, Hidden Timber, Littleburg, Haystack Butte and Rosebud Reservation. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
